data.name: Perpetuum - Upgrade Kit Zero
data.detailed_description:
Upgrade Kit Zero for Perpetuum includes:

  • 120,000 Extension Points (EP) that you can spend on your character's extensions to become better at your trade of choice
  • 4,800 Perpetuum Credits that can be used to purchase monthly EP boosters or downgrade unwanted extensions
  • 3 Alien Improbability Devices, which provide you with random modules or ammunition when activated
  • The exclusive Solaris ST1 "Yuge" spark, which will boost any of your robots' CPU and reactor capacity when installed

Important note for players with multiple accounts linked to Steam


If you have more than one Perpetuum account linked to Steam, the DLC will be applied as follows:
  • If you have a Steam-based account (shown as "Steam user" on the login screen), the DLC will ALWAYS be applied to that account.
  • If you have only non-Steam-based accounts (accounts with an email address), the DLC will be applied to the oldest account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD 3D graphics card with Shader Model 3.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics processors like the Intel GMA series might work but are not officially supported. The ATI Radeon X1000 series is not supported because it does not fully comply with Shader Model 3.0 standards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz multicore Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX260 or higher / AMD Radeon HD 4870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
